title: BMaaS — 01 GPU Health & Diagnostics
description: Per-GPU deep-dive: ECC errors, row remapping, XID errors, thermal/power, NVLink per-GPU, NVSwitch, C2C, PCIe, utilization. Hardware replacement signals.

panels.title: GPU Health Matrix
panels.description: Per-node/GPU overall DCGM health status. Red = FAIL, Yellow = WARN, Green = PASS.

panels.title: ⛔ GPUs Needing Replacement
panels.description: GPUs with DBE > 0, row remap failure, or uncorrectable remapped rows > 0. Any value > 0 = initiate RMA.

panels.title: ⚠️ GPUs Approaching Limit
panels.description: GPUs with correctable remapped rows > 256 (approaching 512 limit).

panels.title: ECC Single-Bit Errors (Aggregate)
panels.description: gpu_ecc_sbe_agg — correctable errors. Rising trend = early memory degradation.

panels.title: ECC Volatile (Since Reboot)
panels.description: gpu_ecc_sbe_vol / gpu_ecc_dbe_vol — errors since last GPU reset.

panels.title: Correctable Remapped Rows
panels.description: gpu_correctable_remapped_rows — tracks HBM bank repairs. Limit ~512.

panels.title: Row Remap Failure
panels.description: gpu_row_remap_failure — 1 = row remapping EXHAUSTED. IMMEDIATE REPLACEMENT.

panels.title: XID Error Timeline
panels.description: job_gpu_xid_error — Critical XIDs: 48 (ECC DBE), 63 (page retirement), 64 (row remap), 74 (NVLink), 79 (NVLink access), 92/94/95 (ECC).

panels.title: Thermal Violation Duration
panels.description: gpu_thermal_violation — > 0 = GPU clocks throttled. Sustained = cooling issue.

panels.title: GPU Power Usage
panels.description: gpu_power_usage — B200 TDP = 1000W. Sustained near TDP = normal under load.

panels.title: Power Violation Duration
panels.description: gpu_power_violation — > 0 = GPU clocks throttled due to power cap.

panels.title: GPU Fabric Status
panels.description: gpu_fabric_status per GPU — GPU excluded from NVLink domain = reduced multi-GPU perf.
